channel.title: [317 Deob] IDs on right click [317 Deob] [Non-Renamed]
channel.description:
How do I make it so when I right click something it shows the ID of it? As in, when you right click an item it would show you the Item ID of it. Or when you right click an object it shows you the Object ID.
If you have a link that can get me to a 317 Deob with that or tell me how to add it or link me to a tutorial that would be helpful.
Note: I've searched everywhere but I couldn't find anything :(
